nodes.text: Jaris Vollrath was a male Human, who worked as an assassin during the time of the Clone Wars.

Vollrath was hired by the Thaereian military to kill Gavid Lermyn, a Thaereian diplomat who hoped to bring peace to Cularin. He attempted to kill Lermyn at a secret peace conference in Hiironi irstat, on Cularin. However, the Heroes of Cularin stopped him from doing so.
